name: Fullmetal Alchemist 3: Kami o Tsugu Shoujo
name_original: Fullmetal Alchemist 3: Kami o Tsugu Shoujo
description: Fullmetal Alchemist 3: Kami o Tsugu Shoujo (鋼の錬金術師3 神を継ぐ少女) is a Action RPG/Action-Adventure video game published by Racjin, Square Enix released on July 21st, 2005 for the PlayStation 2.
